title: Club Friday The Series 5: Secret of an Unreal Heart
overview: The story is about Boss and the self-discovery of his burgeoning homosexuality and how he dealt with the various people that entered and exited his life, including members of his family. This drama also chronicles Boss' first same-sex relationship with Win, whom he met online and later on had a long-distance affair with. Boss struggles to cling on to this relationship as he also tries to deal with his sick mother, his cheating father and his useless siblings.
